node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `notepointers` ( `createtime` datetime NOT NULL default '0000-00-00 00:00:00', `flag` char(1) NOT NULL default 'N', `parent` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', `child` int(11) NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`child`), KEY `time` (`createtime`), KEY `parent` (`parent`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1
node.title: notepointers
